name: the best fighting game of 2017
description:
Yes, you heard that right!

This is the best fighting game of 2017.  Try to prove us wrong!

In this breathtaking fighting game were every miniscule detail matters, nothing is left to chances. This is a game that is easy to learn, but hard to master. However, if you believe enough, you will make it amongst heroes. 

Do you think you have what it takes?
